thread.title: Porsche worker joked about car in Paul Walker crash | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Porsche worker joked about car in Paul Walker crash | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Porsche worker joked about car in Paul Walker crash | Daily Mail Online
text: 'This would be great news to the remaining owners!' Porsche employee accused of joking about the crash that killed Paul Walker because it boosted the value of other 'rare' Carrera GTs Previously redacted emails have been uncovered by Meadow Walker's lawyers An employee email discussed the shrinking number of cars thanks to crashes 'This would be great news to remaining owners as GT becomes rare,' email said Walker is suing the car company for the alleged wrongful death of her father Paul Walker died in November 2013 when a Porsche he was in crashed in LA
